brewery.brewery_description: A proper British refreshment, Hooper’s Alcoholic Brews are available in three nostalgic flavours, including the iconic Alcoholic Dandelion & Burdock, Alcoholic Classic Cherryade and the mouth-watering Alcoholic Rhubarb & Custard. Whether enjoying a drink with friends, catching up with the family or simply having a Good Time In, unleash a taste of familiarity with Hooper’s alcoholic drinks. Discover the full range online today and re-live memories of fonder times. Now a brand belonging to Global Brands Ltd in the UK - check us out at globalbrands.co.uk - and purchasable through their online shopping system, Good Times In.

beer.beer_description: A sparkling alcoholic brew infused with the natural flavours of dandelion and burdock. Hooper's is inspired by the traditional process of fermenting dandelions and burdock thistle roots to deliver a burst of fruitiness and tones of aniseed which blend to a subtle spicy finish.

items.badge_description: Are you crazy? Five different types of beer in one day? Hope you were just sampling.
It takes the perfect amount of light, the right framing and a touch of creative love to get the perfect picture of your brew. Now it’s time to drink it! That’s 5 check-ins with a photo.

beer.beer_description: Hooper's Ginger Brew is a spicy alcoholic brew, infused with spices. Hint of lemon and lime join cinnamon and warming ginger, carrying through to a warming finish. Try serving this with spicy foods and seafood, or simply enjoy chilled over ice.

A sparkling alcoholic brew infused with the natural flavours of dandelion and burdock. Hooper's is inspired by the traditional process of fermenting dandelions and burdock thistle roots to deliver a burst of fruitiness and tones of aniseed which blend to a subtle spicy finish.
A classic alcoholic cloudy lemonade, loaded with the juice of zingy, zesty lemons. Refreshing and thirst quenching, with a lasting zest filled finish.
A sparkling alcoholic cherryade, full of mouth watering sweet cherry notes, inspired by the pop-man of days gone by. This nostalgic flavour is truly a British classic.

A sparkling alcoholic brew which is packed full of rhubarb flavour that delivers just a hint of sharpness. Perfectly balanced by rich but sweet, vanilla custard notes. This nostalgic flavour is truly a British classic.

A sparkling alcoholic lemon drink made from real lemons and natural juices. Hooch is distinct lemon flavor, very refreshing and good in taste. Hooch was one of the first RTD beverages on the market in the early 1990s.
